meanings.definition: The act of not responding or replying.
meanings.sent1: Her nonresponse to the question surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The nonresponse from the audience indicated their disinterest.
meanings.sent3: The nonresponse from the cat when called made the owner chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His nonresponse was like a silent wall, impossible to break through.
meanings.sent5: The nonresponse echoed in the empty hall, emphasizing the silence.

meanings.definition: A lack of response or reaction.
meanings.sent1: The nonresponse to the emergency call caused delays in assistance.
meanings.sent2: The nonresponse of the machine indicated a malfunction.
meanings.sent3: The nonresponse of the plant to sunlight puzzled the botanist.
meanings.sent4: The nonresponse of the ocean to the storm was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The nonresponse of the phone left her feeling helpless.
